Kirundi.text: Ni kubera iki umwami atimira ku wundi?

English.text: Why could not a new king be enthroned while the previous one is still alive?

Kirundi.text:
Icyo kibazo gifite inkomoko mu muco nyarwanda wa kera, aho umwami yabaga afatwa nk'ikirenga mu gihugu, akaba umuyobozi mukuru mu buryo bwose: mu by'umutekano, ubukungu, imibereho y'abaturage, n'imico. Icyubahiro cy'umwami n'umutekano byabaga ari ingenzi cyane ku buryo byasabaga ko afite ibyamuranga bitandukanye n'iby'abandi bantu bose.

Kuba umwami atatimiraga ku wundi bantu byashingiraga ku myemerere y'uko umwami afite ubutwari, ububasha, n'ubutore bidasanzwe bituruka ku Mana, bimwe mu byo yasangiye n'abami b'ibindi bihugu bya Afurika n'ahandi. Gutimira ku wundi bisobanura kubasha gukurikira amagambo yose umuntu avuga kandi ukayatekerezaho. Kuba rero umwami atatimira ku wundi byaterwaga n'ibintu binyuranye:

1. **Icyubahiro cy'Umwami**: Umwami nk'ikirangirire mu gihugu, kumushima cyangwa gukora ikimenyetso icyo ari cyo cyose cyo kumwikiriza byasabaga ko umuntu arenzaho cyangwa afite icyubahiro kihariye. Ibi byashoboraga kwitwa "kutimira" mu buryo bw'icyubahiro.

2. **Ubwirinzi**: Mu myumvire ya kera, byashobokaga ko abanzi b'umwami bashobora gukoresha uburyo bwose bwa gakondo n'amarozi mu kumuhungabanya. Kuba atabaga ashaka gutimira ku muntu, byashobora kuba byarafatwaga nk'uburyo bwo kwirinda imbaraga zishobora kumuhungabanya.

3. **Ubudasa n'Ubukuru**: Umwami yafatwaga nk'udapfa kandi afite ubushobozi bwa kimuntu buhebuje. Ubu budasa bwamutandukanyaga n'abaturage be, ku buryo imyitwarire ye yagombaga kubigaragaza. Gutimira byashoboraga gufatwa nk'igikorwa cy'ubusanzwe kitajyanye n'ubukuru n'ubudasa bwe.

4. **Umuco na politiki**: Muri sosiyete z'abantu, imigirire imwe n'imwe yabaga ari uburyo bwo gusigasira imibanire ya kimuntu na politiki. Byashoboka ko kutimira ku bantu byari bifite igisobanuro cyimbitse mu buryo bw'imitekerereze y'amateka na politiki, bigaha umwami uburyo bwo kugenzura no gucunga imibanire ye n'abandi bategetsi cyangwa abambari be.

Bityo, kuba umwami atatimiraga ku wundi byari bifite impamvu zishingiye ku muco, umutekano, n'icyubahiro bifitanye isano n'imirimo n'inerero by'umwami mu muco nyarwanda wa kera.

prompting_state.prompt: Ni kubera iki umwami atimira ku wundi?

Kirundi.text: Kubera iki abavyeyi babwira abana ko bishe imiserebanyi, canke ibikere nyina wabo aca acika amabere?

English.text: Why did parents tell kids that if they kill lizards or frogs the mother's breasts will be cut off?

Kirundi.text:
Abavyeyi babwira abana ko bishe imiserebanyi, canke ibikere, nyina wabo aca acika amabere nk'uburyo bwo gutuma abana batitaho canke ngo bafate utunyabuzima duto nk'utwo. Ibi bikaba bishika ahanini mu mico itandukanye aho abavyeyi bagerageza gukangurira abana kugira imyifato myiza iranga ubuntu no kubahana hagati y'abantu n'ibindi binyabuzima. Hariho impamvu zitandukanye zishobora gutuma abavyeyi bavuga ibi bintu:

1. **Kugirira ubuntu ibindi binyabuzima**: Ubu buryo bw'inyigisho bukangurira abana gutahura ko n'ibindi binyabuzima bifise agaciro kandi ko bikwiye kubahwa. Birabigisha kutagira inabi cane cane ku binyabuzima bidafite uko bivuga canke bidashobora kwirwanaho.

2. **Kurinda umwana kugira imyifato mibi**: Ku bana bato, gusobanukirwa n'ingaruka z'ibikorwa vyabo birashobora kuba urugendo rurerure. Kubwira umwana ko igikorwa c'iwe gituma haba ingaruka mbi zikomeye, nka nyina w'ikinyabuzima gupfa canke guhura n'akababaro, bishobora kumufasha gutekereza kabiri imbere yo gukora.

3. **Gutoza indero n'uburere**: Ubu ni ubundi buryo bwo kwigisha abana ibijanye n'ikinyabuzima no kububaha. Binyuze mu nkuru zifise ingaruka zikomeye nk'izi, abana barashobora kugira inyota yo kumenya no kwita ku mibereho y'ibindi binyabuzima bitandukanye n'abantu.

4. **Guhanga umuco w'umuco n'ubumenyi mu kibano**: Mu mico itandukanye, inkuru nk'izi zishobora gukoreshwa nk'uburyo bwo guhanga umuco, aho abato bigishwa ibijanye n'ubumenyi n'imico y'igihugu canke ikibano cabo biciye mu nkuru z'ubutumwa bwimbitse.

Birakenewe, ariko, kumenya ko n'ubwo izi nyigisho zishobora kugira akamaro kanini mu kurera abana, ni ngombwa kuvugisha ukuri no kwigisha abana gushira mu gaciro kugira ngo birinde kubahungabanya mu bijanye n'ivyo bemera no mu buryo bufatika bwo kwiga. Kwigisha gukunda no kubaha ibiremwa vyose biri ku isi birashingira ku kwerekana uko twobana n'ibidukikije mu mahoro no mu butungane.

prompting_state.prompt: Kubera iki abavyeyi babwira abana ko bishe imiserebanyi, canke ibikere nyina wabo aca acika amabere?

Kirundi.text: Abana kera batangura kwambara impuzu z’ibiti bafise imyaka ingahe? Kubera iki?

English.text: In the past, at what age could children start wearing clothes? Why?

Kirundi.text:
Mu kiringo c'ubwana, kera abantu batangura kwambara impuzu z'ibiti kuva bakiri bato cyane, cyane cyane mu mico y'abasangwabutaka yo mu bice bitandukanye by'isi, aho umuco n'ibikenewe bya buri muryango w'abantu byabigiragamo uruhare. Impamvu yo kwambara impuzu z'ibiti igenda itandukana bitewe n'akarere, imigenzo y'aho, n'ibikenewe by'umuryango. Muri rusange, abana batangira kwambara impuzu z'ibiti ku myaka iri hagati y'ibiri n'itandatu y'amavuko, kutwambara bikaba bishobora kuba bishingiye ku mpamvu zitandukanye zirimo:

1. **Gukingira** - Impuzu z'ibiti zifashishwaga nk'uburyo bwo gukingira uruhu rw'abana ku zuba, ku mbeho, no ku bindi bishobora kubangamira uruhu rwabo.

2. **Umuhango** - Mu mico imwe n'imwe, ku myaka runaka abana batangira kwambara impuzu z'ibiti nk'igice cy'umuhango wo gukura, aho bimurwa mu cyiciro cy'ubuzima bagana mu kindi, nk'urugero kuva mu bwana bagana mu rubyiruko.

3. **Uburinganire** - Mu mico imwe n'imwe, impuzu z'ibiti zashoboraga kugaragaza ikigero cy'umwana mu muryango n'umuryango mugari, harimo n'ibimenyetso byerekeye kuba uwo mwana ari ingimbi cyangwa inkumi.

4. **Umurimo** - Mu muryango umwe n'umwe, guhera mu bwana bwabo, abana bagombaga kwitabira imirimo itandukanye. Impuzu z'ibiti zari zikenewe ngo zibarinde aho gukora hamwe n'ibikoresho.

Birakwiye kwitonderwa ko igihe n'impamvu byo gutangira kwambara impuzu z'ibiti biba bitandukanye cyane bitewe n'umuco, akarere, n'imibereho y'amateka y'abantu. Kurikije ibikenewe n'ibyiyumvo bya buri muryango, abana bashoboraga kwambara mu buryo butandukanye cyangwa gukoresha ibikoresho bitandukanye mu gukora izo mpuzu.

prompting_state.prompt: Abana kera batangura kwambara impuzu z’ibiti bafise imyaka ingahe? Kubera iki?

Kirundi.text: Kubera iki cazira ko umwana arya mugahinga ku mwaka mushasha?

English.text: Why was it forbidden for kids to eat at their neighbors’ house at the new year?

Kirundi.text:
Mu muco nyarwanda, kurya mugahinga, bisobanuye kurya ibinyampeke byera mu mirima itariki z’umwihariko ku mwaka mushya, bifitanye isano n’imigenzo n’imiziririzo bya kera byubahaga kandi bigatinya imbaraga z'isi n'imyemerere ku butaka n’umusaruro wabwo. Kubuza abana cyangwa n'abantu mukuru kurya ibinyampeke byera (nk'amasaka, ibigori, n'ibindi) mu mirima mbere yuko bisarurwa n'umuganura wizihizwa, byari bifite impamvu zinyuranye zirimo:

1. **Kubahisha Umusaruro**: Byari ukugira ngo umusaruro wubahwe kandi hirindwa ko wononekara cyangwa ugatakaza agaciro kawo mbere y’igihe. Umuganura wabaga ari umunsi wo kwishimira umusaruro, gushimira abakurambere n'imana z'uburumbuke. Kurya ibinyampeke bishya mbere y'uko uyu munsi ugera byafatwaga nko kutubaha uyu muhango.

2. **Gutinya Kubura Umugisha**: Mu myemerere ya kera y'abanyarwanda, hari ugutinya ko kurya mugahinga byabangamira umugisha ku musaruro ukurikiyeho. Babonaga ko ibikorwa nk'ibyo byashyira mu kaga imvura n'uburumbuke bw'imirima mu mwaka ukurikiyeho.

3. **Gushimangira Imyifatire n'Indangagaciro**: Kudatangira kurya ibinyampeke byera mbere y’umuganura byashimangiraga indangagaciro zirimo kwihangana, kubaha imigenzo ya sosiyete, n’urukundo rwo gusangira. Byafashaga mu gukomeza ubumwe mu bantu, aho ibyiza by’umusaruro byizihizwaga na bose hamwe.

4. **Kurinda Ubuzima**: Mu buryo bw'ubuzima, iyi miziririzo yari inafite akamaro ko kuburira abantu kutarya ibinyampeke bitaruma neza cyangwa bitarabasha gukorwaho n’inzobere mu biribwa, bishobora kuba bitarabaga bisobanutse mu myaka ya kera, ariko bikagira ishingiro mu kwirinda ingaruka ku buzima.

Mu gihe ibi byagaragaraga nk’imigenzo n’imiziririzo kuri bamwe, byari bifite imizi mu myemerere, mu mibereho y'abanyarwanda, n'uburyo bwabo bwo gusobanura no guhangana n'ibidukikije n'umusaruro wavaga ku butaka. Uko imyaka yagiye ihita n'ukuntu umuco uhinduka, izi miziririzo zishobora kuba zitarakomeje gukurikizwa cyane nko mu bihe bya kera, ariko zifite umwanya mu mateka n’umuco bya kera by’abanyarwanda.

prompting_state.prompt: Kubera iki cazira ko umwana arya mugahinga ku mwaka mushasha?

Kirundi.text: Kubera iki ku munsi w'umuganuro hari abantu bo mu muryango umwe bahonyorwa n'inka zishotse kunywa amazi?

English.text: On the day of Umuganuro event, there were people from a given clan who were trampled by the cattle. Why?

Kirundi.text:
Umuhango w'umuganuro uba ugamije kwishimira umusaruro, guha Imana icyubahiro ku byo yatanze, no gusaba umugisha ku musaruro utaha. Uyu muhango ufite inkomoko mu muco nyarwanda ndetse n'indi mico itandukanye yo ku isi, aho abantu bahurira hamwe bagasangira umusaruro wabo, bagashimira, kandi bagasaba imigisha y'ahazaza.

Ku bijyanye n'igikorwa cyo guhonyora abantu n'inka zishotse kunywa amazi nk'igice cy'umuhango w'umuganuro, bisaba kwibuka ko imigenzo n'imihango bijyanye n'umuganuro bikunze gutandukana bitewe n'akarere n'umuco w'ahantu. Ubusobanuro bw'iyi ngingo bushobora kuba butandukanye cyane bitewe n'umuco, inkomoko, n'ubusobanuro bwatanzwe mu bihe bitandukanye n'abantu batandukanye.

Gusa muri rusange, mu muco nyarwanda, inka zifite agaciro kanini kandi zifatwa nk'ikimenyetso cy'ubukungu, umugisha, n'icyubahiro. Inka zishobora kandi gushyirwa mu mihango itandukanye yerekana ibyishimo, guhuza umuryango, no gusangira umugisha.

Ku birebana no "guhonyora" abantu mu muco nyarwanda cyangwa mu y' andere mico, iki gikorwa gishobora kugira ibisobanuro bitandukanye, birimo gukina, ibirori, cyangwa kugaragaza umuco. Hari igihe kandi gishobora gutanga isomo rya morali cyangwa ritanga ubutumwa burebana n'ubufatanye, guca bugufi, cyangwa kubaha ibintu bimwe.

Niba uyu muhango wihariye wo guhonyorwa n'inka zishotse kunywa amazi uri gukorwa mu muryango runaka, bishobora kuba bifite igisobanuro cyihariye muri uwo muryango cyangwa agace runaka, gishobora kuba gifite inyigisho cyangwa akamaro kihariye mu muco wabo. Kubera ko imigenzo y'umuco igenda ihinduka kandi ifite amasura menshi, ni ngombwa kuganiriza abantu b'aho kugira ngo umenye neza ibisobanuro n'ubusobanuro bwa yo.

prompting_state.prompt: Kubera iki ku munsi w'umuganuro hari abantu bo mu muryango umwe bahonyorwa n'inka zishotse kunywa amazi?

Kirundi.text: Kera iyo abubakanye babuze uruvyaro babigenza gute?

English.text: In the past, what could a married couple do in order to get children if they don't have them?

Kirundi.text:
Kuguma nta ruvyaro ni ingorane ikomeye ishobora kwibasira imitima y’abashakanye, ikabatera agahinda, amakenga, ndetse n’amakimbirane mu rugo. Iyo abashakanye bahuye n’iki kibazo, hari intambwe bashobora gukurikiza kugira ngo bagerageze kubona umuti w’ikibazo cabo. Dore bumwe mu buryo bw’ibanze bushobora kubafasha:

### 1. Gusuzumisha Ubuzima
- **Gusura muganga**: Ni ngombwa ko abashakanye babanza gusuzumisha ubuzima kugira ngo barebe ko nta kibazo na kimwe cya gihingwa cyangwa kibazo cya muganga gihari kibabuza kuronka uruvyaro.
- **Gukoresha ibizamini**: Hakorerwa ibizamini bibiri; icyo ku mugabo (sperm count) n'icyo ku mugore (imyanya y'imbere ngo hamenyekane ko ntakibazo na kimwe cya biologically kibangamiye).

### 2. Kwivuza
- **Gutera inkunga urubyaro**: Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gutera inkunga urubyaro, nk’ivuriro ryo kubyara, guhuza urusoro n’intanga mu buryo bw’ubuhanga (IVF), n’ubundi buryo.
- **Imiti**: Iyi ni imwe mu nzira iryoheye abashakanye. Muganga ashobora gutanga imiti ishobora gukemura ibibazo byo kubyara.

### 3. Kwisunga Inama
- **Kwegera abajyanama mu mibereho**: Kuganira n’abajyanama mu mibereho cyangwa mu buzima bwo mu mutwe kugira ngo bagufashe gucunga amarangamutima yawe muri iki gihe.
- **Kuganiriza umuryango n’inshuti**: Kuganira n’abantu muba mwizerana bishobora kugabanya umutwaro w’agahinda muba mwifitemo.

### 4. Uburyo Bwunganira
- **Kwakira gufata umwana utari uwawe (adoption)**: Ni igikorwa cyo guhitamo umwana utari uw'amaraso yawe, ukamugira uwe.
- **Gufasha mu kwita ku bana**: Gufasha abandi bana mu miryango cyangwa ibigo by’impfubyi bishobora kandi kuzuza umunezero mu buzima bw’abashakanye.

### 5. Kubitaho no Kwihangana
- **Kwitaho umubano w'abashakanye**: Ni byiza guhora mwibutsanya ko urukundo hagati y'abashakanye rukomeye kandi ko hari ubundi buryo bwinshi bwo kubaka umuryango.
- **Gushikama no kwihangana**: Kubura urubyaro ni ikigeragezo gisaba kwihangana no gukomera mu byiyumvo.

Mu gusoza, ni ingenzi kumenya ko buri murongo cyangwa inzira ifatwa igomba kuba ishingiye ku nama n'ibitekerezo bya muganga w’umwihariko. Hari igihe gusubira ku muganga bikenewe kugira ngo habeho kujyanisha neza n’ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu buvuzi.

prompting_state.prompt: Kera iyo abubakanye babuze uruvyaro babigenza gute?

Kirundi.text: Kubera iki amasaka azokoreshwa ku muganuro bayarinda kugira inyoni ntiziryemwo ishaka na rimwe kugeza bayakuye mu murima?

English.text: Why the sorghum to be used for the Umuganuro event was guarded to the extent that a single bird could not even eat one grain from that field till the day of harvest?

Kirundi.text:
Amasaka yakoreshwaga cyangwa agikoreshwa ku muganuro cyangwa ibirori gakondo muri Afurika y'iburasirazuba, cyane cyane mu Rwanda, afite icyo asobanuye kinini mu muco n'imirire y'abanyarwanda. Kubera iyo mpamvu, kuyarinda inyoni ni ingenzi kugira ngo habungabungwe umusaruro uko bikwiye bitewe n'impamvu zikurikira:

1. **Kwirinda igihombo**: Amasaka ni igihingwa gifite agaciro gakomeye mu mibereho y'abanyarwanda, aho akenshi akoreshwa mu gukora ibinyobwa gakondo nk'inkangaza na sorgho beer (ikigage). Kubera ko aya masaka ari ingenzi mu birori n'imihango itandukanye, harimo n'umuganuro, kuyarinda inyoni bituma igihombo kitaba mu musaruro wagombaga kuboneka kandi ukanakoreshwa mu myiteguro y'imihango.

2. **Uburemere bw'umuganuro**: Umuganuro ni umuhango ukomeye wo gushima no gusaba imigisha y'umwaka utaha mu rwego rw'imyaka n'ibindi bihingwa. Gukoresha amasaka adafite ubusembwa cyangwa yangiritse bituma uyu muhango ugira uburemere n'agaciro kawo, kinesha ko ari andi matora y'abaturage mu gukoresha amasaka ameze neza atarangiritse cyangwa ngo ye kurywa n'inyoni.

3. **Ishusho y'ubukungu n'uburumbuke**: Amasaka meza ataribwe n'inyoni asobanura umusaruro mwinshi, ubukungu, n'uburumbuke mu miryango. Kuva na kera, kugira umusaruro mwinshi byafatwaga nk'ikimenyetso cy'umugisha, bityo kurinda amasaka inyoni byari n'uburyo bwo kwerekana ko umuryango ufite ubushobozi bwo kubyaza umusaruro ubutaka bwabo bityo bakagira amahoro na prosperity.

4. **Kurinda ibinyabuzima biciriritse**: Nubwo inyoni zishobora kuba intungamubiri ku masaka, kuzirinda kurya ku musaruro wateganyijwe ku mihango yo ku rwego rwo hejuru nk'umuganuro biba ari ingenzi. Ibi bikorwa mu buryo bwo kurinda umusaruro ariko nanone hategurwa uburyo bwo kubungabunga no kurinda ibinyabuzima biciriritse, haba mu gukoresha ubundi buryo bwa gakondo mu kurinda amasaka kugira ngo hatagira icyo abantu n'inyamaswa bikururira cyangwa ngo bigire icyo bihombya.

Kurinda amasaka yagenewe umuganuro cyangwa ibindi birori bituma umuco ukomeza guhabwa agaciro kandi umusaruro ukoreshwa muri byo ukarushaho kuba mwiza kandi ukubiyemo uburumbuke n'umugisha w'imiryango nk'uko umuco ubiteganya.

prompting_state.prompt: Kubera iki amasaka azokoreshwa ku muganuro bayarinda kugira inyoni ntiziryemwo ishaka na rimwe kugeza bayakuye mu murima?

Kirundi.text: Ni kubera iki amasanganya y’imodoka ari menshi mu gihugu?

English.text: Why are there lots of car accidents in Burundi?

Kirundi.text:
Amasanganya y’imodoka mu bihugu bitandukanye ashobora guterwa n’impamvu zitandukanye, zimwe muri zo zikunze guhurirwaho hirya no hino ku isi. Dore zimwe mu mpamvu zishobora kubitera:

1. **Umuvuduko ukabije:** Gukoresha umuvuduko uruta uwemewe ku muhanda ni kimwe mu bitera amasanganya menshi. Abashoferi benshi bananirwa guk control imodoka igihe bari ku muvuduko mwinshi.

2. **Ubumenyi buke bwo gutwara imodoka:** Bamwe mu bashoferi baba batarahawe amahugurwa ahagije mu bijyanye no gutwara imodoka neza, cyangwa bateshuka ku mategeko n’amabwiriza byo ku muhanda.

3. **Gutwara basinze cyangwa bakoresha ibiyobyabwenge:** Iki ni kimwe mu bitera amasanganya akomeye ku muhanda. Alcool n'ibiyobyabwenge bigabanya ubushobozi bwo kugenzura neza imodoka no gufata ibyemezo byihuse.

4. **Imihanda mibi:** Imihanda idasanwe, ifite ibyobo, cyangwa itagira ibimenyetso bihagije bishobora guteza impanuka.

5. **Ikoreshwa rya telefone igendanwa mu gutwara:** Gutwara uvugira kuri telefone, cyangwa ukora ibindi bintu bisaba kuyikoresha bigabanya umakenga wo kubona neza ibibera ku muhanda.

6. **Imodoka zidakorewe isuzumwa rya tekinike:** Imodoka zishaje cyangwa zitagenzurwa neza zishobora gutera amasanganya bitewe n’ibibazo bya mekanike.

7. **Ibiza n’ibihe by’ikirere:** Kubura ubumenyi cyangwa uburangare mu bihe by’imvura nyinshi, ibihu, cyangwa ibindi biza by’ikirere bishobora kongera ibyago by’impanuka.

8. **Umuvundo w’imodoka mu mihanda:** Umuvundo ukabije ushobora gutera abashoferi gufata ibyemezo bibi nko guca mu nzira zitemewe cyangwa gukoresha umuvuduko udakwiriye mu rwego rwo kugerageza kugabanya igihe gito.

Ukurikije ibi bivuzwe, gukemura ikibazo cy’amasanganya y’imodoka bisaba ubufatanye bw’inzego za leta, imiryango itegamiye kuri leta, abikorera n’abaturage muri rusange mu guteza imbere umuco wo kubaha amategeko y’umuhanda, kongera ibikorwa remezo by’imihanda, gukora ubukangurambaga ku mutekano wo mu muhanda, no gukaza amategeko y'umuhanda hamwe n’ibihano ku bayica.

prompting_state.prompt: Ni kubera iki amasanganya y’imodoka ari menshi mu gihugu?

Kirundi.text: Kubera iki abantu benshi banyuruzwa mu Burundi?

English.text: Why are there many people kidnapped in Burundi?

Kirundi.text:
Abantu banyuruzwa mu Burundi kubera impamvu zitandukanye, kandi ibi bibazo biterwa n'ihindagurika ry'ibihe na politiki mu gihugu. Mu myaka yashize, Burundi bwabaye mu bihe bya politiki bitari bimwe, ari na byo ntandaro y'umutekano muke, ihungabanywa ry'uburenganzira bwa muntu, n'ibikorwa by'ubunyuruzi bw'abantu. Dore zimwe mu mpamvu z'ingenzi zitera ubunyuruzi bw'abantu mu Burundi:

1. **Amakimbirane ya Politiki na Gisirikare:**
   Burundi bwaranzwe n'ibibazo bya politiki n'intambara za gisirikare mu myaka yashize, ibi bikaba byaratumye habaho umutekano muke, guhunga kw'abaturage, no kuba abantu benshi baba mu bukene bukabije. Aya makimbirane akenshi atuma habaho ibikorwa byo kunyuruza abantu, haba mu gushimuta abatavuga rumwe na leta cyangwa abagaragaje ibitekerezo bya politiki bitavugwaho rumwe, abo mu miryango ibarwanya, n'abandi bashobora kubona nk'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi.

2. **Ubukeneye bw'Abakozi mu Mahanga:**
   Mu Burundi, nk'uko bimeze no mu bindi bihugu byinshi bifite ubukungu buciriritse, abantu benshi barashaka amahirwe y'akazi ahandi, ari nabyo bituma bamwe mu baturage bashobora kugwa mu mutego w'ababizeza akazi hanze y'igihugu. Bashobora nyuma kubona bari mu maboko y'abitwaza intwaro cyangwa abantu b'abanyabyaha babashora mu bikorwa by'uburetwa, ubucakara bwo mu ngo, inganda z'ubusambanyi, cyangwa ibindi bintu biteye inkeke.

3. **Ubukene n'Imibereho Mibi:**
   Ubukene bukomeye burangwa mu bice byinshi by'igihugu bituma abaturage, cyane cyane urubyiruko, bashakisha uburyo bwose bwo kwiteza imbere. Ibi bituma bamwe mu baturage bagwa mu mitego y'abanyuruzi bubakangurira kubaha akazi cyangwa amahugurwa mu mahanga, ariko bakisanga mu bikorwa by'icuruzwa ry'abantu.

4. **Ubutabera Bucye bw'Ibihano ku Banyereza Abantu:**
   Akenshi, abakoze ibyaha byo kunyuruza abantu ntibahanwa nk'uko bikwiye, ibi bikabatera gukomeza ibikorwa byabo bidahana kubera kudatinya ingaruka. Ubwumvikane buke mu bijyanye n'ubutabera n'ubutabera butinze nabyo bikomeza guha urwaho iki kibazo.

Leta y'u Burundi n'amashyirahamwe mpuzamahanga akorera muri iki gihugu, nka Loni, bamaze igihe bagomba gufatanya mu rugamba rwo guhangana n'iki kibazo, harimo no gutanga ubufasha ku bahuye n'icuruzwa ry'abantu, no gukaza amategeko ahana uwo ari we wese ufatanywe icyaha cyo kunyuruza abantu. Hari n'ibikorwa by'imishinga yo kuzamura imibereho y'abaturage nko gutanga amahugurwa y'umwuga n'ibikorwa byo kubaka amashuri n'ibitaro mu rwego rwo kurwanya impamvu zituma abantu banyuruzwa.

prompting_state.prompt: Kubera iki abantu benshi banyuruzwa mu Burundi?

Kirundi.text: Ni kubera iki Umukuru w’igihugu c’uburundi atagira indege, iyo afashe ingendo yipakiza nk’abandi?

English.text: Why doesn't the President of Burundi have a private jet and travels like a regular passenger?

Kirundi.text:
Kubona umukuru w'igihugu adafite indege ye bwite ishobora guterwa n'impamvu zitandukanye, kandi ibi bikaba bitandukanye bitewe n'igihugu ku kindi. Ku bijanye n'Uburundi, impamvu zishobora gutuma Umukuru w'igihugu atagira indege ye bwite yifashisha mu ngendo zakwirikira.

1. **Ubukungu bw'igihugu:** Imwe mu mpamvu zishoboka ni ubushobozi bw'ubukungu bw'igihugu. Gutunga no gukomeza indege ya Perezida bisaba amafaranga menshi yaba mu kugura, gukoresha no gufata neza iyo ndege. Uburundi bufatwa nk'igihugu kiri mu bihugu bikennye cyane ku isi, bishobora gutuma guhitamo kutagira indege ya Perezida biba igikorwa cyo kugabanya amafaranga y'igihugu yakoreshwa mu bindi bikorwa by'ingenzi bijyanye n'iterambere ry'abaturage.

2. **Ihame ry'ubukene n'ukugabanya imikoreshereze y'amafaranga mu butegetsi:** Hari igihe abategetsi bafata ingamba zo kugabanya ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe by'ubutunzi nk'ikimenyetso cyo gukorera mu mucyo no kwirinda gusesagura. Ibi bishobora gufatwa nk'uburyo bwo kurushaho kwereka abaturage ko butegetsi buhangayikishijwe n'ikoreshwa neza ry'umutungo w'igihugu.

3. **Gukodesha indege igihe zikenewe:** Gukodesha indege mu gihe cy'ingendo z'umukuru w'igihugu gishobora kuba igisubizo gifatika mu kugabanya amafaranga yakoreshwa mu gutunga no gufata neza indege yihariye. Ibi bishobora kumvikana nk'uburyo bwiza bwo gukoresha neza umutungo w'igihugu, kuko indege ikoreshwa gusa igihe hakenewe.

4. **Imyitwarire y'abategetsi b'igihugu:** Bishoboka ko kuba Umukuru w'igihugu yipakiza nk'abandi baturage baba bagiye hanze y'igihugu, byaba biri mu rwego rw'imyitwarire n'imigenzereze igamije kwerekana ko ari umuyobozi uhuje n'ubuzima bw'abaturage basanzwe, cyane ko abenshi mu baturage ba Uburundi babaho mu buzima bwo hasi hashingiye ku mutungo.

Mu gusoza, nubwo izi mpamvu zishobora gutanga ishusho y’impamvu umukuru w’igihugu c'Uburundi ashobora guhitamo kudatunga indege ye bwite, ni byiza kumenya ko ibi bishobora guhinduka bitewe n'ubushobozi bw’igihugu n’ubuyobozi buriho n'icyerekezo bafite.

prompting_state.prompt: Ni kubera iki Umukuru w’igihugu c’uburundi atagira indege, iyo afashe ingendo yipakiza nk’abandi?

Kirundi.text: Kubera iki amahera y’Uburundi aguma ata agaciro birenze?

English.text: Why is the Burundian currency highly devaluating?

Kirundi.text:
Amahera y’igihugu imwe muri zimwe mu ntambanyi zikomeye ku butunzi bw'ico gihugu. Ku bijanye n'Uburundi, katakamotoka k'agaciro k'idorari ry'amarundi gashobora gufatwa nk'ikimenyetso c'ibibazo bitandukanye bijanye n'ubutunzi bwa politike hamwe n'ibibazo vy'umutekano, vyagize ingaruka ku butunzi bw'ico gihugu mu myaka iheze. Naho bishobora guhinduka, hari impamvu z'ingenzi zishobora gutuma amahera y’Uburundi, canke ifaranga ry'amarundi, aguma ata agaciro birenze. Izimwe muri izo mpamvu zirashobora kuba zikurikira:

1. **Ubukene bw'ivunjwa ry'ibidandazwa**: Uburundi bwaranzwe n'ubukene bw'ivunjwa riboneka mu bidandazwa bija hanze. Ifaranga ry’igihugu rishobora gutakaza agaciro igihe igihugu kidashobora kwinjiza amahera y’amafaranga y’amanyamahanga binyuze mu kudandaza ibidandazwa hanze.

2. **Ubutegetsi bw’igitugu na politike**: Ihungabana rya politike n’ubutegetsi bw’igitugu birashobora gutuma abanyamitahe b'abanyamahanga batinya gushora imari mu gihugu, bikagabanya uruja n'uruza rw'ifaranga ry'agacoko ku masoko mpuzamakungu.

3. **Ibibazo vy’umutekano**: Ingaruka z’ibibazo vy’umutekano muke nazo zirashobora gutuma haba ihungabana mu bukungu, bigatuma ifaranga ry’igihugu ritakaza agaciro.

4. **Ubukene bw'amadeni hanze n'urugero rw'amafaranga y'agaciro karenga**: Ushobora kugera aho ubukene bw’amadeni hamwe n'agaciro karenga k'ifaranga vyotuma habaho ihindagurika ry'agaciro k'idorari ry'amarundi mu masoko mpuzamakungu.

5. **Ingingo za banki nkuru y’igihugu zitajanye n’igihe**: Ingingo zitajanye n’igihe zifatwa na banki nkuru y'igihugu, nk'ugukwiragiza amafaranga menshi mu butunzi, nazo zirashobora gutuma ifaranga ridakomeye.

6. **Ubucuti buke n'amakungu**: Igihugu gifitaniye ubucuti buke hamwe n'amakungu bishobora kugira ingaruka kuri kahise k'uwo mwanya n'iterambere ry'ejo hazoza mu vy'ubutunzi, bigatuma amakungu asaba ibihano vy'ubutunzi bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku gaciro k'ifaranga.

Kugira ngo agaciro k'ifaranga ry'Uburundi ribe rikomeye, hakenewe intambwe z'ukugene ubutunzi bw'igihugu bwarushaho kuzamura urwego rw'ubudandaji mpuzamakungu, gukomeza itunganywa rya politike na demokarasi, kunagura ibidukikije vy'ubudandaji kugira ngo bishobore kuresha abanyamitahe b'abanyamahanga, hamwe no gukomeza ingamba zo gutunganya neza ubutunzi hamwe n'ifaranga.

prompting_state.prompt: Kubera iki amahera y’Uburundi aguma ata agaciro birenze?

Kirundi.text: Abanyagihugu baguma banyuruzwa bicwa mu Burundi bazira iki?

English.text: Why are people being kidnapped and killed in Burundi?

Kirundi.text:
Mu Burundi, ibibazo bijanye n'ihohoterwa rya kiremwa muntu, kunyuruza abantu, ubwicanyi, hamwe n’iyicarubozo, bikomeje kugaragara nk’ibibazo bikomeye vyugarije igihugu. Impamvu zituma abanyagihugu bahura n'ibi bibazo ziratandukanye kandi zirashobora kuba zirimo ibi bikurikira:

1. **Intambara za Politiki**: Mu Burundi, ibibazo bya politike ni bimwe mu bituma habaho kunyuruza no kwica abantu. Ibi bishobora gukorerwa abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi, abanyapolitiki batavuga rumwe n'ishyaka riri ku butegetsi, n'abandi bantu bashobora kuvugwa ko ari abanywanyi b'amashyaka atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi.

2. **Ibibazo by’Uburenganzira bwa Muntu**: Ibihugu mpuzamahanga n’imiryango iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu bamaganye kenshi ihohotera rikorwa na leta y’u Burundi cyangwa imitwe ishigikiye ubutegetsi, iri hohotera rikaba rigamije gutera ubwoba no gucecekesha abatavuga rumwe na leta.

3. **Ubusugire bw’Uburenganzira bw’Itangazamakuru**: Abamenyeshamakuru mu Burundi baguma bahura n'ihohoterwa, ifungwa, ivangura, no kunyuruzwa. Bamwe baricwa bazira akazi kabo ko guhishura ukuri kw'ibiriko biraba mu gihugu.

4. **Ikibazo cy'Ubutabera Burangwa n'Ibitaziguye**: Abanyagihugu benshi bashobora gufatwa ntibagezwe imbere y’ubutabera cyangwa bakaburana mu buryo butubahirije uburenganzira bwabo bwo kwiregura, bigatuma umuco wo kudahana ukomeza kuba ikibazo.

5. **Amakimbirane ashingiye ku moko namoko na politike**: U Burundi bufite amateka maremare y’amakimbirane ashingiye ku moko na politike. Ibi bishobora gutuma haba ihohoterwa rigamije gutoteza canke kwikiza abo mu bwoko canke mu gatsiko ka politike kabonwa nk'umwanzi.

Izi ni zimwe mu mpamvu z’ingenzi zishobora gutuma abanyagihugu banyuruzwa bakanicwa mu Burundi. Ni ngombwa ko habaho imbaraga zihuje z'ibihugu byo mu karere, imiryango mpuzamahanga, na leta y'u Burundi ubwayo, mu gushakira umuti urambye ibi bibazo by’ihohoterwa rya kiremwa muntu no kugarura amahoro arambye mu gihugu.

prompting_state.prompt: Abanyagihugu baguma banyuruzwa bicwa mu Burundi bazira iki?

Kirundi.text: Ni Kubera iki twahevye gukoresha imiti kama kandi yaravura indwara nyinshi?

English.text: Why did we stop using traditional medicines while they treated many diseases?

Kirundi.text:
Hari impamvu nyinshi zatumye tuba duheba gukoresha imiti kama (cyangwa imiti gakondo) mu buryo bwagutse, ariko tugahitamo imiti ya kizungu. Zimwe muri izo mpamvu ni izi zikurikira:

1. **Ubushakashatsi n’Iterambere Rigezweho**: Imikorere y’imiti ya kizungu iriho ubu yemejwe binyuze mu bushakashatsi bwimbitse burimo igerageza ryakorewe ku bantu, ibi bituma habaho icyizere cyinshi cy’ubuziranenge n’ubushobozi bwayo bwo kuvura indwara zitandukanye. Ni mu gihe imiti kama rimwe na rimwe itahabwa agaciro kanini mu rwego mpuzamahanga kubera kubura kwayo kw’ubushakashatsi bushingiye ku mibare nyayo n’ibimenyetso by’ubushakashatsi.

2. **Ubwoko bw’Indwara**: Indwara zihindura isura uko ibihe bihita, bimwe mu bitera indwara n’ubwoko bw’indwara ubwabyo biri guhinduka, bityo bisaba uburyo bugezweho bwo kubivura. Imikorere iriho y’ubuvuzi bw’iyo miti ya kizungu yubatswe ku guhangana n’izi mpinduka, naho imiti kama ishobora kutaba ifite ubwo bushobozi.

3. **Umuvuduko w’Ivura n’Ubushobozi**: Imwe mu miti ya kizungu ifite ubushobozi bwo gutanga ibisubizo vuba kandi birambye mu kuvura indwara, binyuranye n’imiti kama ishobora gufata igihe kirekire igaragaza umusaruro. Ibi bishobora kuba byaratijwe umurindi n’imirongo y’imibereho y’abantu muri iki gihe ifite umuvuduko n’ukuntu bashaka ibisubizo byihuse.

4. **Imyumvire n'Amateka**: Mu myaka yashize, imiti kama yagiye ibonwa nk'iy'abantu bo mu byaro cyangwa abatuye mu duce twitaruye. Ibi byagiye bituma imiti gakondo idahabwa agaciro kangana n'agahabwa ubuvuzi bwa kizungu, bigatuma ubuhanga bwayo butitabwaho n’ubushakashatsi mpuzamahanga nk’ubwo mu miti ya kizungu.

5. **Ubuziranenge n’Ubuzima**: Hari impungenge zijyanye n’ubuziranenge bw’imiti kama no kuba itagenzuwe neza nk’uko imiti ya kizungu igenzurwa. Ibi bituma abantu batinya gukoresha imiti batazi neza ingaruka zayo mu gihe kirekire cyangwa ukuntu yahuzwa n’indi miti.

Nyamara, ni ingenzi kuvuga ko imiti kama igifite umwanya wayo mu buvuzi bw’ikirenga kandi iri guhabwa agaciro kongeye nko mu buvuzi bwunganira (complementary medicine) na farumasi, aho ibikomoka ku bimera biri gukoreshwa mu gukora imiti ivura indwara zimwe na zimwe. Hari n’aho ubushakashatsi burebera hamwe imiti ya kizungu n’imiti kama mu rwego rwo kuvumbura inzira nshya zo kuvura.

prompting_state.prompt: Ni Kubera iki twahevye gukoresha imiti kama kandi yaravura indwara nyinshi?

Kirundi.text: Ni kubera iki uburundi ata muyagankuba ukwiye bufise kandi bufise ibiyaga vyinshi?

English.text: Why does Burundi not have enough electricity while it has lots of lakes?

Kirundi.text:
Ingwara y'ukubura canke ukugabanuka kw'umuyagankuba mu Burundi ishingiye ku mvo nyinshi, n'ubwo igihugu gifise ibiyaga vyinshi. Ubudumbidumbi bw'umuyagankuba mu Burundi bushobora gusigurwa biciye ku bintu bikurikira:

### 1. Gukoresha nabi amasoko y'amazi

Nubwo Burundi bufise ibiyaga vyinshi, gukoresha neza ayo masoko y'amazi mu vy'ukuri guhingura umuyagankuba si ivyigwa vyitabweho cane. Gukora ibikorwa remezo bifasha gutunganya umuyagankuba biva mu mazi bisaba ishoramari rinini, hamwe n'ubuhinga bugezweho mu bijanye n'ubuhinga bwo kubaka no gucunga izo ngomero.

### 2. Ubutunzi bw'igihugu

Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu bikenye kw'isi, ivyo bituma kutagira ubushobozi bukwiye bwo gushora imari mu bikorwa vyo guhingura umuyagankuba canke gukora ibikorwa remezo bikomeye. Uruhagarara rwa politike hamwe n'ibibazo vy'umutekano mu myaka iheze vyaragabanyije ishaka ry'abashoramari b'abanyamahanga.

### 3. Iyongerekana ry'abanyagihugu

Ukwo abanyagihugu barushiriza kwiyongera mu Burundi bituma ivyipfuzo vy'umuyagankuba birushiriza kwiyongera kurusha uko isoko rishobora gutanga. Ibi vyongereza ikibazo co kubura umuyagankuba mu gihugu.

### 4. Kwisunga umuyagankuba uva mu bindi bihugu

Burundi bumwe mu buzi bwarisunze umuyagankuba uva mu bihugu bibanyi nk'u Rwanda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, ariko ibi ntabwo ari igisubizo kirama kuko ivyo bihugu navyo nyene bishobora guhura n'ibibazo vy'umuyagankuba.

### 5. Ibibazo vy'ikirere

Ihindagurika ry'ikirere ryagize ingaruka ku biyaga n'uruzi rw'igihugu, rimwe na rimwe bikagabanya inguvu z'umuyagankuba zoshobora gutangwa n'izo soko z'amazi. Amazi make canke ayasigaye mbere y'uko atunganywa ashobora kutemerera ingomero gukora ku rugero rukwiye.

### Umwanzuro

Kugira ngo Burundi bushobore gukemura ikibazo c'umuyagankuba, harakenewe ishoramari ridasanzwe mu bikorwa remezo vyo guhingura no gutanga umuyagankuba, gushigikira amashirahamwe y'abikorera ivyabo mu gisata c'inguvu, no gushira mu ngiro ingamba zijanye n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere. Hari n'ibisabwa kwitaho guhimiriza amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu n'ibindi bihugu mu gushigikira ivyo bikorwa, kandi gufata ingingo zituma igihugu gikoresha neza amasoko yaco y'amazi n'andi masoko y'inguvu zisubira.

prompting_state.prompt: Ni kubera iki uburundi ata muyagankuba ukwiye bufise kandi bufise ibiyaga vyinshi?

Kirundi.text: Ni kubera iki umwami yaba afise abagore mu turere twinshi tw’igihugu?

English.text: Why would a king have wives in many regions of the country?

Kirundi.text:
Impamvu umwami yoba afise abagore mu turere twinshi tw’igihugu zirashobora gutandukana bitewe n'umuco, amateka, politiki na sosiyete y'ico gihe. Nk'uko vyagiye biraboneka mu mateka y'ibihugu bitandukanye, hari impamvu zimwe z'ingenzi zatumye umwami ashobora kugira abagore mu turere dutandukanye tw'igihugu:

1. **Gushimangira Ubumwe Bw'Igihugu:** Mu bihe vy'ubwami, gukomeza ingo z'ubwami mu turere dutandukanye vyari uburyo bumwe bwo gushimangira ubumwe bw'igihugu. Kugira abagore mu turere twinshi vyatumye hakomezwa imigenderanire n’ubucuti hagati y'ubwami n’utwo turere, bigatuma igihugu gikomera.

2. **Gutera Imbere kwa Politike:** Kugira abagore mu turere dutandukanye vyari uburyo bw’umwami bwo kugira imigenderanire myiza n'abatware b'utwo turere. Hari igihe vyakoreshejwe nk'uburyo bwo gukomeza amasezerano y'ubufatanye cyangwa amahoro hagati y'ubwami n'utwo turere.

3. **Urwego Rw’Imibereho n’Ubukire:** Mu bihe vy'ubwami, umwami ni we yari afise ubukire n'ububasha bwo kurongora abagore benshi kubera ko yashobora kubatunga. Kugira abagore mu turere dutandukanye vyerekana ubukire, ububasha, n'ivyo umwami ashoboye.

4. **Ukwiyongera k'Umwami:** Ukwiyongera kw'umwami mu bagore mu turere dutandukanye kwatumye yongera abana be, bikaba vyarafashije mu gukwirakwiza umuryango w’ubwami mu gihugu cose, bikomeza kandi ishusho y’ubwami mu abahezagirwa n’ubwo bwami.

5. **Imigenzo n’Umuco:** Mu mico imwe n’imwe, hari ho imigenzo n'imico ivuga ko umwami agomba kugira abagore benshi nk'ikimenyetso c’inganji yiwe n’ubushobozi bwo kurondoka kw'igihugu. Ivyo vyashobora kujana no kugira abagore mu turere dutandukanye dukize.

Mu gusozera, impamvu zituma umwami yoba afise abagore mu turere twinshi zirashobora kuba zifise imvo za politike, ubukungu, umuco, canke ivy'inganji z'ubwami. Kuri ubu, izo nyifato ntizikigenderwa muri sosiyete nyinshi zigezweho, aho ihame ry’ukugendera ku mategeko y'uburenganzira bw'ikiremwa muntu n'ukuringaniza kuba mu mibereho y'abantu ryateye imbere.

prompting_state.prompt: Ni kubera iki umwami yaba afise abagore mu turere twinshi tw’igihugu?

Kirundi.text: Amasezerano yo kwakwa akarere ka Bugufi yasinyiwe na ba nde? Ryari? Kubera iki?

English.text: Who signed the agreement that deprived Burundi of the region of Bugufi? When? Why?

Kirundi.text:
Amasezerano yo kwakwa akarere ka Bugufi, azwi cyane nka "Treaty of Trianon," yasinyiwe ku itariki ya 4 Kamena 1920. Aya masezerano yari agamije gusubiza ibibazo by’imipaka n’ubusugire bwa leta byatewe n’Intambara ya Mbere y’Isi, akaba yarayobowe kandi ashyirwaho umukono n’ibihugu byatsinze intambara birimo cyane cyane Amerika, Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa, na Italia, hamwe n’ibihugu byatsinzwe muri iyo ntambara, aha tukavuga cyane cyane Hungari.

Icyakora, "akarere ka Bugufi" ntikaragaragara mu mateka y'amasezerano y'ingenzi yasinywe nyuma y'intambara, bishoboka ko washakaga kuvuga ingaruka z'Amasezerano ya Trianon ku bihugu byo muri ako karere, cyane cyane Hungari. Aya amasezerano yagabanyije ubuso bwa Hungari hafi ya ⅔ biyigira igihugu gito cyane ugereranyije n’uko cyari kimeze mbere mu Bwami bwa Austro-Hungari. Yateye kandi kuva mu gihugu imiryango irenga miliyoni itatu y'Abahungari, babaga mu bice byatanzwe ku bindi bihugu. Ibi byatewe ahanini no kugerageza gushyiraho imipaka ishingiye ku moko yabantu mu Burayi bwo hagati, mu gihe cyo kongera gushyira ibintu mu buryo nyuma y'isozwa ry'intambara.

Impamvu y’ingenzi y’amasezerano nk'aya, harimo no kugerageza gukumira ko habaho indi ntambara nk’iyi mu Burayi. Igitekerezo cyari uguha buri muryango w’abantu uburenganzira bwo kwigenga no kubaho mu gihugu kirimo abenshi muri bo, ariko bikozwe mu buryo butakaje ibihugu byatsinzwe ubusugire bwinshi. Ibi, hamwe no kubaka amahoro arambye mu Burayi, byari intego z’ibihugu byatsinze. Ariko, inzira yo kubigeraho, nko gucagagura Hungari n’ibindi bihugu byo mu karere, yavuyemo andi makimbirane n’akababaro gakomeye mu bihe byakurikiyeho.

Kirundi.text: Umugabo yemeye kwigura umwami Mwezi Gisabo yitwa gute? Hari habaye iki?

English.text: What is the name of the man who accepted to die in order to save the king Mwezi Gisabo? What had happened?

Kirundi.text:
Umugabo wemeye kwigura umwami Mwezi Gisabo yitwa Bishikira. Mu gihe cy'urugamba rwo ku Rucunshu, mu mwaka wa 1852, igihe umwami Mwezi Gisabo yari mu kaga gakomeye ko gufatwa n'abanzi be, Bishikira yemeye kwitanga agafatwa mu cyimbo cye, kugira ngo umwami abashe guhunga. Ibi byatumye Mwezi Gisabo yongera gutora agatege, akaza no gutsinda urwo rugamba.

Bishikira, wari uzwiho kuba indahemuka cyane kuri Mwezi Gisabo, yafashe icyemezo cyo kwitanga kubera ubudahemuka bwe bukomeye ku mwami we. Iyi ntwari yahisemo kwitanga idashingiye ku giti cye gusa, ahubwo ku nyungu rusange z'igihugu cye n'umwami we. Nyuma yo gufatwa n'abanzi afite umugambi wo kurokora Mwezi Gisabo, ntibyagaragaye neza mu mateka ibyakurikiyeho byabayeho kuri Bishikira, ariko igikorwa cye cy'ubutwari cyaharaniye umutekano w'umwami n'igihugu cye cyaramamaye.

Ibi byabaye mu mateka y'u Burundi, igihugu gitunze umuco w'ubwami bwahozeho mu Karere k'Ibiyaga Bigari. Mwezi Gisabo yibukwa nk'umwe mu bami b'ingenzi mu mateka y'u Burundi kubera uburyo yahanganye n'abakoloni, cyane cyane Abadage, agerageza kubungabunga ubwigenge bw'igihugu cye mu bihe bigoye by'ubukoloni. Ibikorwa by'ubutwari nk'ibi, aho abantu bahaye agaciro inyungu rusange zirenze kure izabo bwite, bigize igice kitazibagirana cy'amateka y'ibihugu n'imico y'abantu.
